wordGroup: physical attractiveness 外表吸引力；体态吸引力

sentences.en: Psychologist and behavioral scientist Nicholas Epley oversaw a key study into self-enhancement and attractiveness.
sentences.cn: 心理学家和行为科学家尼古拉斯·埃普利监督了一项关于自我提升和吸引力的重要研究。

sentences.en: Psychologist and behavioral scientist Nicholas Epley oversaw a key study in to self-enhancement and attractiveness.
sentences.cn: 心理学家和行为科学家尼古拉斯·埃普利监督了一项关于自我提升和吸引力的重要研究。

sentences.en: First, we decide whether we are superior or inferior to others on certain dimensions, such as attractiveness, intelligence, popularity, etc.
sentences.cn: 首先，我们判断自己在某些方面比别人强还是弱，比如吸引力、智力、受欢迎程度等。
